column1: A service for Barbara will be held on Thursday
column3: 2015 at 2:00 pm at Monroe Manor in Barron
column4: WI with Rev. Frank Distad officiating. Visitation will be a half an hour (1/2) prior to services at Monroe Manor. Burial will be at Wayside Cemetery in Barron
column5: WI. Arrangements are being handled by Rausch & Steel Funeral Home in Barron
